## Checklist

- [ ] `cargo check` passes
- [ ] `cargo test` passes
- [ ] `cargo clippy` has no new warnings
- [ ] Tool descriptions include: when to use, return format, workflow hints, and error conditions
- [ ] Parameter doc-comments include defaults, allowed values, and cross-tool references where applicable
- [ ] README.md updated (if adding/changing tools)
- [ ] Tool count in `server.rs` is correct
